column5: I am looking to book a cottage and guide service on quinte this year for a weekend has anyone used one in the past? Or maybe we will just get a hotel and use a guide if we can't find a good cottage thing.  I saw one that said 80 per day for Cottage, Heated hut and minnows, has anyone used Sunset Cabins?  Normally i would just go myself and wander around and be happy with a skunker here and there, but since I will be taking the GF for her first quinte experience I want to try and make sure we get on some fish.
Maybe give Lloyd Daume (fishhunter) a shout.
Here you go, give Dave a call tell him i sent you. http://www.fishfindercharters.com/ you will never go wrong with Dave. His first class service is next to none.
